description.en_US: Animagine XL 4.0, also stylized as Anim4gine, is the ultimate anime-themed finetuned SDXL model and the latest installment of Animagine XL series. Despite being a continuation, the model was retrained from Stable Diffusion XL 1.0 with a massive dataset of 8.4M diverse anime-style images from various sources with the knowledge cut-off of January 7th 2025 and finetuned for approximately 2650 GPU hours. Similar to the previous version, this model was trained using tag ordering method for the identity and style training. With the release of Animagine XL 4.0 Opt (Optimized), the model has been further refined with an additional dataset, improving stability, anatomy accuracy, noise reduction, color saturation, and overall color accuracy. These enhancements make Animagine XL 4.0 Opt more consistent and visually appealing while maintaining the signature quality of the series.
description.zh_CN: Animagine XL 4.0，也被称为 Anim4gine，是终极的动漫主题微调 SDXL 模型，也是 Animagine XL 系列的最新版本。尽管是延续，该模型是从 Stable Diffusion XL 1.0 重新训练的，使用了来自各种来源的 840 万张多样化的动漫风格图像的大型数据集，知识截止日期为 2025 年 1 月 7 日，并进行了约 2650 小时的 GPU 微调。与前一版本类似，该模型在身份和风格训练中使用了标签排序方法。随着 Animagine XL 4.0 Opt（优化版）的发布，该模型通过额外的数据集进行了进一步优化，提高了稳定性、解剖准确性、降噪、色彩饱和度和整体色彩准确性。这些增强功能使 Animagine XL 4.0 Opt 更加一致且视觉上更具吸引力，同时保持了该系列的标志性品质。
